titles.title: A bill to amend the Neotropical Migratory Bird Conservation Act to reauthorize the Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Boxer without amendment. With written report No. 111-165.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 327.

bill.summary: 3/22/2010--Reported to Senate without amendment. Amends the Neotropical Migratory Bird Conservation Act to increase the amount authorized to be appropriated for FY2010 and to authorize appropriations for FY2011-FY2015.
